name: Kana Samurai
description:
Possessed spirits have come to attack your humble village! Learn the art of writing Hiragana, and use your calligraphy and combat skills to guide the Yokai back to peace!

Made for the 2021 College Game Jam


Attributions:

Art and Programming : Garrett Dickinson (myself)

Music:

  • Autumn Garden - Joseph Beg
  • Cherry Blossom Fall - Joseph Beg
  • The Bloom of Cherry Blossoms - Sight of Wonders
